mapper.select: SELECT a.advice_id adviceId, a.advice_type adviceType, s.sentence_id sentenceId, s.content, u.user_id writerId, u.nickname writerName FROM sentence_advice a LEFT JOIN sentence_unit s ON a.sentence_id = s.sentence_id LEFT JOIN note n ON s.note_id = n.note_id LEFT JOIN user u ON n.owner_id = u.user_id WHERE n.topic_id = #{topicId}
